snippet: When Representative Andrea Seastrand first arrived on Capitol Hill in January 1995, the first thing she did was pledge undying fealty to Speaker Newt Gingrich and unalloyed support for his strongly conservative Contract With America.         To he...
lead_paragraph: When Representative Andrea Seastrand first arrived on Capitol Hill in January 1995, the first thing she did was pledge undying fealty to Speaker Newt Gingrich and unalloyed support for his strongly conservative Contract With America. To hear her tell it, she has been under political siege ever since here, in California's 22d Congressional District on the Central Coast.

headline.main: Gingrich Ally Under Siege at Home
